sentences.sContent: You would think screenplay dialogue should be easy to write.
sentences.sContent_eng: You would think screenplay dialogue should be easy to write.
sentences.sCn: 你可能认为电影剧本的对话应该易于编写。

sentences.sContent: Well, you’re in luck because we can help with one of those things. Writing your first screenplay.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, you’re in luck because we can help with one of those things. Writing your first screenplay.
sentences.sCn: 好，你很幸运因为我们可以帮助你实现其中之一，即创作你的第一部电影剧本。

sentences.sContent: Visualize your screenplay and write it according to what you want your audience to see and hear in your movie script.
sentences.sContent_eng: Visualize your screenplay and write it according to what you want your audience to see and hear in your movie script.
sentences.sCn: 请设想你的电影剧本,并按照你希望观众在剧本中看到的和听到的东西写它.

trans.tranOther: the words that are written down for actors to say in a film, and the instructions that tell them what they should do
